mapper.select: SELECT count(t.openid) + 1 AS rankNum FROM t_exp_decorate_user t WHERE t.count_price > ( SELECT t_exp_decorate_user.count_price FROM t_exp_decorate_user WHERE openid = #{openid} )

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rankNum, IFNULL(t.user_phone,"****") as user_phone, t.openid, t.nick_name, t.count_price, t.balance_price, t.head_img FROM t_exp_decorate_user t ,(SELECT @rownum:=0) r ORDER BY t.count_price DESC
